title: Denver Pool Halls
name: Denver Pool Halls
description:
A Map by Jerryl

Denver listing of pool halls/bars with tables. Weekly tournaments and types listed if known.

properties.name: Brooklyn's
properties.description: Posted by Jerryl 5445 Olde Wadsworth Blvd, Arvada, CO 80002Nice pool hall. Lots of tournaments. Bar boxes, 9ft, lots of tables.

properties.name: Greenfields
properties.description: Posted by Jerryl 3355 S Yarrow St, Lakewood, CO 80227Primarily a bar. All bar boxes. Weekly tournaments.

properties.name: Metro 9
properties.description: Posted by Jerryl Fairly new place. About 14 tables. Big screen viewable from everywhere in hall. Food, bar. Weekly tournaments exist.

properties.name: Mirage Cafe & Sports Bar
properties.description: Posted by Jerryl  8340 W Coal Mine Ave Ste 1 Columbine Valley, CO 80123

properties.name: Rack 'Em Cue Club
properties.description: Posted by Jerryl 1919 S Havana St, Aurora, CO 80014Lots of tables. Food, bar. Tournaments exist. Fairly odd crowd.

properties.name: Sancho's
properties.description: Posted by Jerryl Primarily a bar. Very cool place. Young, hippy-ish crowd. 3 bar boxes, quarters, challenge to play. No tournaments.

properties.name: Shakespeare's
properties.description: Posted by Jerryl Haven\'t verified this information, but here\'s what I found: Tuesday 7:30 p.m. Open 9-Ball Tuesday 6:30 p.m. Carom Wednesday In-House League Thursday Ladies Night (starts at 5 p.m.) Saturday Ladies Open 9-Ball

properties.name: Table Steaks
properties.description: Posted by Jerryl Older place. On the shady side. Lots of money around.

properties.name: Table Steaks East
properties.description: Posted by Jerryl Nice place, little older. Weekly tournaments. Food, bar, arcade.

properties.name: Table Steaks South
properties.description: Posted by Jerryl 101 W Floyd Ave, Englewood, COBrand new pool hall. Lots of tables and players. It\'s open till 4am. Food, bar, and arcade as well.

properties.name: Tarantula's Billiards
properties.description: Posted by Jerryl Seedy pool hall with a fairly young, inner-city crowd. Pool is always free and the tables are somewhat decent. Live DJ mixes music. I know nothing about leagues/tournaments here.

properties.name: Wynkoop Brewing Company
properties.description: Posted by Jerryl 1634 18th Street Denver, CO 80202Upstairs is where the pool hall is. About 16 9ft tables, two bar boxes.
